    • Constructor Detail

      • Bitmap

        public Bitmap(int[] data,
      int width,
      int height,
      int x,
      int y)
        Constructor for Bitmap based on integer pixel values
        Parameters:
        data - Array of pixel data, one integer per pixel. Should have a length of width*height.
        width - Width of bitmap represented by data
        height - Height of bitmap represented by data
        x - Desired x-coordinate of bitmap
        y - Desired y-coordinate of bitmap

      • Bitmap

        public Bitmap(byte[] data,
      int width,
      int height,
      int x,
      int y,
      int Bpp)
        Constructor for Bitmap based on
        Parameters:
        data - Array of pixel data, each pixel represented by Bpp bytes. Should have a length of width*height*Bpp.
        width - Width of bitmap represented by data
        height - Height of bitmap represented by data
        x - Desired x-coordinate of bitmap
        y - Desired y-coordinate of bitmap
        Bpp - Number of bytes per pixel in image represented by data

      • decompressImgDirect

        public static WrappedImage decompressImgDirect(int width,
                               int height,
                               int size,
                               RdpPacket_Localised data,
                               int Bpp,
                               java.awt.image.IndexColorModel cm,
                               int left,
                               int top,
                               WrappedImage w)
                                        throws RdesktopException
        Decompress bitmap data from packet and output directly to supplied image object
        Parameters:
        width - Width of bitmap to decompress
        height - Height of bitmap to decompress
        size - Size of compressed data in bytes
        data - Packet containing bitmap data
        Bpp - Bytes per-pixel for bitmap
        cm - Colour model of bitmap
        left - X offset for drawing bitmap
        top - Y offset for drawing bitmap
        w - Image to draw bitmap to
        Returns:
        Original image object, with decompressed bitmap drawn at specified coordinates
        Throws:
        RdesktopException

      • decompressImg

        public static java.awt.Image decompressImg(int width,
                           int height,
                           int size,
                           RdpPacket_Localised data,
                           int Bpp,
                           java.awt.image.IndexColorModel cm)
                                    throws RdesktopException
        Decompress bitmap data from packet and output as an Image
        Parameters:
        width - Width of bitmap
        height - Height of bitmap
        size - Size of compressed data in bytes
        data - Packet containing bitmap data
        Bpp - Bytes per-pixel for bitmap
        cm - Colour model for bitmap (if using indexed palette)
        Returns:
        Decompressed bitmap as Image object
        Throws:
        RdesktopException

                  int height,
                  int size,

        Decompress bitmap data from packet and store in array of integers
        Parameters:

        height - Height of bitmap
        size - Size of compressed data in bytes
        data - Packet containing bitmap data
        Bpp - Bytes per-pixel for bitmap
        Returns:

        Throws:
        RdesktopException

      • decompress

        public static byte[] decompress(int width,
                int height,
                int size,
                RdpPacket_Localised data,
                int Bpp)
                         throws RdesktopException
        Decompress bitmap data from packet and store in array of bytes
        Parameters:
        width - Width of bitmap
        height - Height of bitmap
        size - Size of compressed data in bytes
        data - Packet containing bitmap data
        Bpp - Bytes per-pixel for bitmap
        Returns:
        Byte array of pixels containing decompressed bitmap data
        Throws:
        RdesktopException
